item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (179 points | 55 comments)
2. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (54 points | 24 comments)
3. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (218 points | 177 comments)
4. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (122 points | 39 comments)
5. Accents in Latent Spaces: How AI Hears Accent Strength in English (88 points | 41 comments)
6. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (37 points | 18 comments)
7. The curse of knowing how, or; fixing everything (715 points | 318 comments)
8. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (56 points | 5 comments)

10. Propositions as Types (2014) [pdf] (71 points | 25 comments)

20. Sea snail teeth top Kevlar, titanium as strongest material (2015) (91 points | 46 comments)
21. The Turkish İ Problem and Why You Should Care (2012) (86 points | 123 comments)
22. Replacing Kubernetes with systemd (2024) (367 points | 263 comments)

24. Why does Switzerland have so many bunkers? (121 points | 131 comments)
25. Show HN: Outpost – OSS infra for outbound webhooks and event destinations (41 points | 5 comments)
26. Memory-safe sudo to become the default in Ubuntu (123 points | 113 comments)
27. Turning into Turing (2022) (18 points | 1 comment)
28. Dreariness Index (2015) (25 points | 23 comments)
29. Technical analysis of the Signal clone used by Trump officials (759 points | 308 comments)
30. Getting things “done” in large tech companies (227 points | 158 comments)
